channel.title: Damn Random Dcs
channel.description:
People on my server are just randomly dcing every so often and its getting really annoying... And theres no errors in my run.bat..
Does anyone know a fix?

item.title: Damn Random Dcs
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

Well if it is your VPS, then it will kick everyone as its a global dis-connection. But something tells me that theres a loop either in your run.bat or somewhere in your server/connection files.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn Random Dcs
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

teh one:

It sounds more like your internet than a code problem, or the networking in the server might be temperamental. If theres no loop, auto restart or restart boolean, then it has to be either your hosting provider (no-ip etc…) or your modem.

Well it could be my vps, but why would everyone fricken get kicked randomly

Read full topic

item.title: Damn Random Dcs
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

It sounds more like your internet than a code problem, or the networking in the server might be temperamental. If theres no loop, auto restart or restart boolean, then it has to be either your hosting provider (no-ip etc…) or your modem.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn Random Dcs
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:5, topic:423978”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=526630.msg3836328#msg3836328 date=1322938564]

Could be a auto-reset, how many players do you have online?

Wat? And it’s just me atm.

ah, do you have like a loop set for anything? cuz sometimes those can be a problem and dc people :s and what source r u using?
[/quote]
Riipiin let me use his base rune-sanctum and im not sure about that.[/quote]
hmm i know he had a few players on that, and when i went to check it out, and never got dc’d. Keep me posted on what you find out, cuz i would like 2 know the problem

Read full topic
